about.coachIntro: Coach. Athlete. Engineer of Human Performance.
about.mission: With over a decade on the front lines of competitive bodybuilding, I've seen the industry evolve from "gut feel" to scientific precision. My mission is to bridge that gap for you.
about.philosophy: I don't believe in mediocre results. Every athlete under my wing is treated as a high-performance machine. We optimize your fuel, your torque, and your recovery until the objective is achieved.
about.quote: THE ONLY BARRIER BETWEEN YOU AND YOUR PRO CARD IS THE DISCIPLINE YOU LACK TODAY.
about.biomechanicsDesc: Eliminating inefficient movement patterns to maximize tension.
about.nutritionDesc: Metabolic adaptation management and nutrient partition scaling.
about.recoveryDesc: Sleep architecture and neurological fatigue monitoring.
about.mindsetDesc: Psychological grit and tactical stage confidence.

achievements.proCardsDesc: Successfully guided elite athletes to professional status.
achievements.olympiaDesc: Prepared athletes for the world's biggest bodybuilding stage.
achievements.nationalDesc: Overall champion with 12 years of competitive experience.

testimonials.title: WHAT THEY
testimonials.subtitle: REAL RESULTS FROM REAL ATHLETES
testimonials.t1: CMB changed my life. I stopped guessing and started growing. The plan was clear, the support was real.
testimonials.t2: The level of detail in the bio-feedback monitoring is unmatched. I stepped on stage confident and full.
testimonials.t3: No fluff. Just the plan you need to grow. Ayoub doesn't sugarcoat anything, and that's why it works.
testimonials.t4: I added 12kg of lean mass in 6 months. The nutrition protocol was a game changer.
testimonials.t5: Professional, scientific, and brutal. Exactly what I needed to break my plateau.
testimonials.t6: The psychology aspect of the coaching is underrated. He builds your mind as much as your body.

results.title: THE
results.subtitle: CONSISTENT. MEASURABLE. ELITE. THESE ARE THE ATHLETES WHO FOLLOWED THE SYSTEM.
results.ctaText: THE SYSTEM WORKS IF YOU DO. STOP GUESSING AND START GROWING WITH THE CMB PROTOCOL.

resultDetail.strategyText: We started with a metabolic repair phase. The client was under-eating and over-training. We pulled back volume, increased calories, and drove up strength numbers. Once metabolism was primed, we executed a 12-week deficit while maintaining 98% of lean tissue.
resultDetail.clientQuote: I thought I knew how to train until I started this program. The level of detail in the bio-feedback monitoring changed everything. I stepped on stage confident and full.
resultDetail.wantResultsText: Every transformation starts with a decision. Apply now to see if you qualify for the team.

contact.title: JOIN THE
contact.subtitle: WE ONLY ACCEPT 5 NEW ATHLETES PER MONTH TO ENSURE MAXIMUM QUALITY OF COACHING. FILL OUT THE FORM HONESTLY.
contact.step1: Application Review: I personally check your starting point and objectives.
contact.step2: Video Consultation: A 15-min deep dive to see if we're a psychological match.
contact.step3: Onboarding: Biometric gathering and initial program release.
